The Federal Operational and Search Activities Act of DATE sets down the rules for “ operational and search activities ” ( “ OSAs ” – such as collecting information , infiltrating the criminal milieu , conducting undercover surveillance and intercepting correspondence ) by the law - enforcement bodies , in particular the police .
